Haiku

  • desert night jog
    feeling all will be okay
    while dark mountains lurk

  • hemispheres apart
    as the fall begins for me
    a fresh spring for you

  • a barren ruin
    a tsunami of emotion
    swept through this body

  • white cloud like brains
    while my head is in the clouds
    lacking gray matter

  • night desolation
    abandoned intersection
    traffic lights blinking

  • this autumn weather
    synchronized with emotions
    dreary but at ease
